text:
[Rama laments over Lakshmana's unconscious state. Hanuman is directed by Sushena to Himalayas and get herbs for treating Lakshmana. Hanuman gets the herbs and on inhalation of the herbs Lakshmana recovers.]

शक्त्याविनिहतंदृष्टवारावणेनबलीयसा ।

लक्ष्मणंसमरेशूरंरूधिरौघपरिप्लुतम् ।।6.102.1।।

स दत्त्वातुमुलंयुद्धंरावणस्यदुरात्मनः ।

विसृजन्नेवबाणौघान् सुषेणमिदमब्रवीत् ।।6.102.2।।
meaning: बलीयसा exceedingly mighty, रावणेन by Ravana, शक्त्या by the javelin, विनिहतम् struck, समरे in fight, शूरम् heroic, रूधिरौघपरिप्लुतम् soaked in blood, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, दृष्टवा seeing, सःhe, दुरात्मनःevil minded, रावणस्य Ravana's, तुमुलम् intense, युद्धम् fight, दत्त्वा given, बाणौघान् arrows, विसृजन्नेव even discharging, सुषेणम् Sushena, इदम् this, अब्रवीत् spoke
translation: Seeing Lakshmana struck by exceedingly mighty, evil minded Ravana's javelin and soaked in blood Rama giving intense fight by discharging arrows also spoke as follows to Sushena.

text:
[Rama laments over Lakshmana's unconscious state. Hanuman is directed by Sushena to Himalayas and get herbs for treating Lakshmana. Hanuman gets the herbs and on inhalation of the herbs Lakshmana recovers.]

शक्त्याविनिहतंदृष्टवारावणेनबलीयसा ।

लक्ष्मणंसमरेशूरंरूधिरौघपरिप्लुतम् ।।6.102.1।।

स दत्त्वातुमुलंयुद्धंरावणस्यदुरात्मनः ।

विसृजन्नेवबाणौघान् सुषेणमिदमब्रवीत् ।।6.102.2।।
meaning: बलीयसा exceedingly mighty, रावणेन by Ravana, शक्त्या by the javelin, विनिहतम् struck, समरे in fight, शूरम् heroic, रूधिरौघपरिप्लुतम् soaked in blood, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, दृष्टवा seeing, सःhe, दुरात्मनःevil minded, रावणस्य Ravana's, तुमुलम् intense, युद्धम् fight, दत्त्वा given, बाणौघान् arrows, विसृजन्नेव even discharging, सुषेणम् Sushena, इदम् this, अब्रवीत् spoke
translation: Seeing Lakshmana struck by exceedingly mighty, evil minded Ravana's javelin and soaked in blood Rama giving intense fight by discharging arrows also spoke as follows to Sushena.

meaning: रावणवीर्येण prowess of Ravana, भुवि earth, पतितः fallen, एषः like that, वीरः hero, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, शोकम् sorrow, उदीरयन् writhing, सर्पवत् like snake, भूमौ on the ground, चेष्टते rolling
translation: 'Heroic Lakshmana struck by Ravana, fell on the ground and writhing like a snake and rolling made me sad'.

meaning: मम my, प्राणैः more than life, प्रियतरम् loving, शोणितार्द्रम् soaked in blood, इमम् this way, वीरम् heroic, पश्यतः as I see, पर्याकुलात्मनः mind agitated, मम me, योद्धुम् to fight, शक्तिः energy, का how
translation: ' As I see Lakshmana, who is more than my life, and loving soaked in blood, my mind is agitated. How can I have the energy to fight?'

meaning: समरश्लाघी praised for efficiency in war, शुभलक्षणः endowed with auspicious marks, सःhe, अयम् this, मे my, भ्राता brother, पञ्चत्वम् death, आपन्नःयदि if meets, मे my, प्राणैः life, सुखेनवा happiness, किम् What use
translation: 'Lakshmana, my brother, is praised for his efficiency in war, is endowed with auspicious marks. If he is met with death, what use is my happiness and life for me?'

meaning: वीर्यम् heroism, लज्जतीव shy, धनुः bow, करात् from hand, भ्रश्यतीव slip from, सायकाः arrows, व्यवसीदन्ति dropping, दृष्टिः vision, बाष्पवशम् filled with tears, गताहि gone
translation: 'My heroism is shy, my bow slips from my hand, arrows are dropping, my vision is blurred with tears with my brother gone.'

meaning: स्वप्नयाने in dream, नृणामिव while walking, गात्राणि limbs, अवसीदन्ति retrieves, मे my, चिन्ता grief, तीव्रा intense, वर्तते growing, मुमूर्षापि च being on the point of death, जायते desire to live is going
translation: 'Seeing Lakshmana in this state, just as in dream, my limbs are retrieving while walking, being on the point of death intense sorrow is growing and the desire to live is gone.'

meaning: दुरात्मना evil minded, रावणेन by Ravana, निहतम् wounded, विष्टनन्तम् filled with grief, दुःखार्तम् sad, भृशम् breathing heavily, मर्मणि vital parts, अभिहतम् struck, भ्रातरम् brother, दृष्टवा seeing
translation: Seeing the brother struck in vital parts and wounded by the evilminded Ravana, Rama was filled with grief and breathing heavily.

meaning: राघवो Raghava, भ्रातरं brother, दृष्टवा seeing, प्रियं dear, प्राणंबहिश्चरम् life outside, दुःखेन in grief, महताविष्टो overcome by anxiety, ध्यानशोकपरायणःgave himself to great sorrow lost senses
translation: Beholding his dear brother, who is his life outside him overcome by anxiety, Rama lost senses and gave himself to great sorrow.

meaning: निहतम् wounded, भ्रातरम् brother, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, रणपांसुषु in the battlefield, दृष्टवा seeing, परम् very, विषादम् sad, आपन्नः overtaken, आकुलेन्द्रियःlost control over senses, विललाप grieved
translation: Seeing the wounded brother Lakshmana in the battlefield, the very sad Rama lost control over his senses and grieved.

meaning: शूर hero, विजयोपि if victorious, मे for me, प्रियाय loving, न उपकल्पते not give joy, अचक्षुर्विषयः for one who has lost vision, चन्द्रः moon, काम् desire, प्रीतिम् जनयिष्यति What pleasure will it give
translation: 'O Hero! Even victory for me will not give joy. What pleasure will one have if he desires to see the moon when he has lost vision?'

meaning: मे to me, युद्धेन in the battle, किम् what, प्राणैः life, किम् what, अयंलक्ष्मणः this Lakshmana, रणमूर्धनि in the forefront of battle, निहतः struck, यत्र here, शेते lying, युद्धकार्यम् purpose of fighting, न विद्यते not known
translation: 'What purpose is there to fight in battle or in life with Lakshmana lying in the forefront struck in the battlefield?'

meaning: महाद्युतिः endowed with splendour, वनम् forest, यान्तम् followed, माम् me, यथैव in the same way, अनुयाति follow, अहमपि I also, तथैव in the same way, एनम्, यमक्षयम् god of death, उपयास्यामि follow him
translation: 'Lakshmana who is endowed with splendour followed me to the forest. In the same way I will follow him to the god of death.'

meaning: इष्टबन्धुजनः loved kin, नित्यम् always, माम् me, अनुव्रतः devoted to me, सः he, कूटयोधिभिः has been led to, राक्षसैः Rakshasas, इमाम् this way, अवस्थाम् situation, गमितः pass by
translation: 'Lakshmana, who loved the kin and was devoted to me, has been led to pass by the Rakshasas.'

meaning: देशेदेशे everywhere, कलत्राणि wives, देशेदेशे च everywhere, बान्दवाः relatives, सहोदरः sibling brother, भ्राता brother, यत्र here, तम् him, देशंतु no place, न पश्यामि not found
translation: 'Wives can be found everywhere, relatives can be found everywhere but biological sibling brothers are not found in any place.'

meaning: इत्येवम् in this manner, विलपन्तम् grieving, शोकविह्वलितेद्रनियम् lost control over senses in grief विवेष्टमानम् lost sense of discrimination, पुनःपुनः again and again, करुणम् pitiable, उच्छवसन्तम् sighing, तम् him, रामRama, वीर hero, सुषेनो Sushena, आस्वसयन consoling, अब्रवीत spoke, वाक्यम words
translation: Grieving in this manner, lost control over senses, and discrimination, Rama was sighing again and again and was pitiable. Sushena, the hero consoling Rama spoke these words.

meaning: दुर्धर्षलक्ष्मणेनविना without Lakshmana who is difficult to win, मम me, राज्येन kingdom, किंनु why, पुत्रवत्सलाम् lover of son, अम्बाम् mother, सुमित्राम् to Sumithra, अहम् I, किंनुवक्ष्यामि What can I tell
translation: 'Without Lakshmana who is difficult to win, what use is kingdom to me? What can I tell mother Sumithra who is the lover of her son?'

text:
न मृथोयंमहाबाहो लक्ष्मणोलक्षमिवर्धन: ।

न चास्यविक्रतंवक्त्रानापिशस्वासं न निष्प्रभं ।।6.102.18।।
meaning: महाबाहो O broad shouldered, लक्षमिवर्धन: enhancer of prosperity, लक्ष्मणोthis Lakshmana, न मृथो not dead, चास्यविक्रतंnot changed वक्त्रा face नापि also न निष्प्रभंnot lost splendour
translation: O Broad shouldered Rama! Enhancer of prosperity, Lakshmana is not dead. His face has not changed, and he has not lost splendour.

meaning: सुप्रभम् radiant, सुप्रसन्नं pleasing, अस्य his, मुखम् face, निरीक्ष्यताम् seeing, हस्तौ palms, पद्मपत्रतलौ red lotus like, लोचने च and eyes, सुप्रसन्ने very pleasant
translation: 'His face is radiant and pleasing to see. His palms are like red lotuses and his eyes are so pleasant'.

meaning: विशम्पते such form, वीर heroes, गतासूनाम् ceased of life, रूपम् form, ईदृशब् marks, न दृश्यते not seen, अरिन्दम tamer of foes, अयम् this, सप्राणः those who are alive, विषादम् grief, माकृथाःI tell you
translation: "O hero! Those who cease to live will not have such appearance and signs. He who is a tamer of foes is alive. I tell you, do not grieve."

meaning: तु you, प्रसुप्तस्य fallen thus, स्रस्तगात्रस्य from the limbs, सोच्छवासम् lying alive, मुहुर्मुहुः again and again, कम्पमानम् throbbing, हृदयम् heart, आख्याति is known
translation: "From the movement of his limbs and throbbing of his heart again and again it is known that he is alive."

meaning: महाप्राज्ञः very wise, सुषेणःSushena, राघवम्to Raghava, एवम् in that manner, वचःwords, उक्त्वा having spoken, समीपस्थम् nearby, महाकपिम् great Vanara, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, इदम् thus, उवाच spoke
translation: Very wise Sushena, having spoken like that to Raghava, spoke to the great Vanara, Hanuman nearby.

meaning: सौम्य gentle, वीर heroic, यःअसौ that which, पूर्वम् earlier, जाम्बवता Jambavantha, तव your, कथितः spoken, औषथिपर्वतम् mountain of herbs, शैलम् peak, इतः now, शीघ्रम् quickly, गत्वाreach, दक्षिणेशिखरे southern peak, जाताम् having gone, नाम्ना by name, सवर्णकरणीम् Sarvakarani, महौषधिम् great herb, तथा so also, सावर्ण्यकरणीम् Savarnakarani, सञ्जीवकरणीम् Sanjeevakarani, सन्धानीं च Sandhanakarani, महौषधीम् great herbs, महात्मनः great soul, वीरस्यhero's, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, सञ्जीवनार्धम् to make him alive, इह here, आनय come
translation: "O gentle Hanumantha! Going to that mountain of herbs about which Jambavan had earlier spoken to you, get the herbs from the southern peak of that great mountain. To make Lakshmana the great soul alive quickly go and get Savarankarani, Sarvakarani so also Sanjeevakarani and Sandhanakarani and come."

meaning: सौम्य gentle, वीर heroic, यःअसौ that which, पूर्वम् earlier, जाम्बवता Jambavantha, तव your, कथितः spoken, औषथिपर्वतम् mountain of herbs, शैलम् peak, इतः now, शीघ्रम् quickly, गत्वाreach, दक्षिणेशिखरे southern peak, जाताम् having gone, नाम्ना by name, सवर्णकरणीम् Sarvakarani, महौषधिम् great herb, तथा so also, सावर्ण्यकरणीम् Savarnakarani, सञ्जीवकरणीम् Sanjeevakarani, सन्धानीं च Sandhanakarani, महौषधीम् great herbs, महात्मनः great soul, वीरस्यhero's, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, सञ्जीवनार्धम् to make him alive, इह here, आनय come
translation: "O gentle Hanumantha! Going to that mountain of herbs about which Jambavan had earlier spoken to you, get the herbs from the southern peak of that great mountain. To make Lakshmana the great soul alive quickly go and get Savarankarani, Sarvakarani so also Sanjeevakarani and Sandhanakarani and come."

meaning: सौम्य gentle, वीर heroic, यःअसौ that which, पूर्वम् earlier, जाम्बवता Jambavantha, तव your, कथितः spoken, औषथिपर्वतम् mountain of herbs, शैलम् peak, इतः now, शीघ्रम् quickly, गत्वाreach, दक्षिणेशिखरे southern peak, जाताम् having gone, नाम्ना by name, सवर्णकरणीम् Sarvakarani, महौषधिम् great herb, तथा so also, सावर्ण्यकरणीम् Savarnakarani, सञ्जीवकरणीम् Sanjeevakarani, सन्धानीं च Sandhanakarani, महौषधीम् great herbs, महात्मनः great soul, वीरस्यhero's, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, सञ्जीवनार्धम् to make him alive, इह here, आनय come
translation: "O gentle Hanumantha! Going to that mountain of herbs about which Jambavan had earlier spoken to you, get the herbs from the southern peak of that great mountain. To make Lakshmana the great soul alive quickly go and get Savarankarani, Sarvakarani so also Sanjeevakarani and Sandhanakarani and come."

meaning: इत्येवम् in this manner, उक्तः having said, श्रीमान् glorious, हनुमान् Hanuman, औषधिपर्वतम् mountain of herbs, गत्वा having gone, ताः those, महौषदीः great herbs, अजानन् not able to recognize, चिन्ताम् thought over, अभ्यगतम् after having reached
translation: Sushena having said so, glorious Hanuman set out to the mountain of herbs. Not able to recognise the herbs he thought over.

meaning: अमितौजसः highly brilliant, तस्यमारुतेः that Maruthi, बुद्धि: intellect, समुत्पना sprung, गिरेःon mountain, इदम् thus, शिखरमेव peak, गृहीत्वा seized, गमिष्यामिwill take
translation: Highly brilliant Hanuman used his intellect and thought to seize the peak of the mountain on which herbs had sprung.

meaning: सुखावहाम् that which does good, ताम् to him, ओषधिम् herb, अस्मिन् in this, शिखरे peak, जाताम् growing, प्रतर्केण reasoning, अवगच्छामि is known, सुषेणः Sushena, एवम् in that way, अब्रवीत् हि has told
translation: By reasoning it is known that the herb which is good for him is grown in this peak, for Sushena said so.

meaning: अहम् I, विशल्यकरणीम् Visalakarani, अगृह्य taking, गच्छामियदि if I go, कालात्ययेन through passage of time, दोषः mistake, स्यात् again, महत् huge, वैक्लब्यं च perplexity, भवेत् will arise
translation: 'If I go without taking Visalakarani, through the passage of time huge mistakes will happen and perplexity will arise'.

meaning: महाबलः mighty, हरिशार्दूलः tiger among Vanaras, हनुमान् Hanuman, इति thus, सञ्चिन्त्य thinking, क्षिप्रम् quickly, गत्वाgoing, पर्वतश्रेष्ठम् foremost of the mountains, आसाद्य reached, गिरेः mountain, शिखरं top, हस्ताभ्याम् with both hands, गृहीत्वाseized, त्रिःthrice, प्रकम्प्य shaking, फुल्लनानातरुगणम् with plants, flowers in bloom, समुत्पाट्य uprooted, महाबलः mighty, समतोलयत् balanced
translation: Hanuman, the mighty among the Vanaras, thinking so quickly reached the foremost of the mountains, seized the mountain with both hands by shaking it thrice, uprooted the plants with flowers in bloom and balanced it with his hands.

meaning: महाबलः mighty, हरिशार्दूलः tiger among Vanaras, हनुमान् Hanuman, इति thus, सञ्चिन्त्य thinking, क्षिप्रम् quickly, गत्वाgoing, पर्वतश्रेष्ठम् foremost of the mountains, आसाद्य reached, गिरेः mountain, शिखरं top, हस्ताभ्याम् with both hands, गृहीत्वाseized, त्रिःthrice, प्रकम्प्य shaking, फुल्लनानातरुगणम् with plants, flowers in bloom, समुत्पाट्य uprooted, महाबलः mighty, समतोलयत् balanced
translation: Hanuman, the mighty among the Vanaras, thinking so quickly reached the foremost of the mountains, seized the mountain with both hands by shaking it thrice, uprooted the plants with flowers in bloom and balanced it with his hands.

meaning: सःहनूमान् that Hanuman, तोयपूर्णम् filled with water, नीलम् bluish, जीमूतम् इव like the wind, गिरेःशिखरम् mountain peak, गृहीत्वा holding, नभस्तलात् from the earth surface, उत्पपात went into air
translation: Like a dark cloud filled with water carried by wind, Hanuman held the mountain peak and went in the air from the surface of the earth.

meaning: महावेगः at high speed, हनुमान् Hanuman, समागम्य came, गिरेः mountain, शिखरम्peak, संन्यस्यletting it down, किञ्चित् for a while, विश्रम् resting, सुषेणम् to Sushena, इदम् thus, अब्रवीत् spoke
translation: Hanuman came at high speed with the mountain and letting it down and resting for a while spoke as follows.

meaning: हरिपुङ्गव leader of Vanaras, अहम् I, ताः those, ओषधीःherbs, नावगच्छामि did not know, तस्यitsगिरेः mountain, तत् that, इदम् here, कृत्स्नम् dark, शिखरम् peak, मया by me, आहृतम् brought
translation: "O leader of the Vanaras! I did not know those herbs. So, the mountain peak was brought here by me."

meaning: एवम् in that manner, कथयमानम् having revealed, पवनात्मजम् by the son of wind god, प्रशस्य applauding, वानरश्रेष्ठः leader of the Vanaras, सुषेणः Sushena, ओषधीः herb, उत्पाट्य uprooted, जग्राह took up
translation: The son of wind god, having revealed it like that, Sushena the leader of the Vanaras uprooted the herb and took out.

meaning: सुरैरपि even for Suras, सुदुष्करम् very difficult, हनूमतः Hanuman, कर्म task, दृष्टवा seeing, सर्वे all, ते them, वानरपुङ्गवाः Vanara leaders, विस्मिताः amazed, बभूवुः were
translation: It is a difficult task even for Suras. Seeing Hanuman doing it all the Vanara leaders were amazed.

meaning: ततः thereafter, वानरोत्तमः foremost of Vanaras, सुमहाद्युतिः brilliant, सुषेणः Sushena, ताम् them, ओषधिम् herbs, सङ्क्षोदयित्वा crushed, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, नस्तः nose, ददौ dropped
translation: Thereafter, Sushena the foremost of the Vanaras, a brilliant one crushed the herbs and dropped the extract into Lakshmana's nose.

meaning: सशल्यः pained with piercing of that javelin, परवीरहा destroyer of enemies, सः he, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, समाघ्राय inhaling, विशल्यः devoid of javelin, विरुजः rid of pain, महीतलात् from the ground, शीघ्रम् quickly, उदतिष्ठत् got up
translation: The destroyer of enemies, Lakshmana, who was pained by the javelin stuck in his body, on inhaling the herb, was devoid of javelin and rid of pain. He got up from the ground.

meaning: हरयः Vanaras, भूतलात् from the surface of the ground, उत्थितम् arisen, तंलक्ष्मणम् that Lakshmana, दृष्टवा seeing, सुप्रीताः very affectionately, साधुसाधुइति well done well done, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, प्रत्यपूजयन् in turn offered prayers
translation: Seeing Lakshmana rise up from the surface of the ground, the Vanaras said Well done and offered prayers very affectionately.

meaning: परवीरहा destroyer of enemies, रामःRama, एहिएहि come, इति thus, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् spoke, बाष्पपर्याकुलेक्षणः eyes filled with tears, स्नेहगाढं च overcome with affection, सस्वजेembraced him
translation: Rama the destroyer of enemies seeing Lakshmana saying, 'come come', eyes filled with tears of joy affectionately embraced him and spoke.

meaning: तदा then, राघवः Raghava, सौमित्रिम् Saumithri, परिष्वज्य embracing, अब्रवीच्छ spoke this, वीर hero, दिष्ट्या luckily, मरणात्from death, पुनःagain, आगतम् come, त्वाम् you, पश्यामिI see
translation: Embracing Saumithri, Rama spoke 'luckily you have recovered from death again and I am able to see you'.

meaning: त्वयि you, पञ्चत्वम् from the five elements, आगते not come out, मे to me, जीवितेन life, सीतया even Sita, विजयेनवा or victory, अर्थः meaning, न हि not there, मे to me, तेन your, कः what, अर्थः use, वद said
translation: 'Lakshmana! If you had not come out of death, what use is life to me? What is the use of Sita? What is the meaning of life' said Rama?

meaning: महात्मनः great soul, राघवस्य Raghava's, इत्येवम् in this manner, वदतः spoken, भिन्नः broken, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, शिथिलया irresolute, वाचा talk, वाक्यम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke
translation: When Raghava had spoken in that manner, Lakshmana spoke, pained by the irresolute talk (of Rama).

meaning: सत्यपराक्रम of truthful valour, पुरा earlier, तांप्रतिज्ञाम् you having made a vow, प्रतिज्ञाय vow, असत्त्वः weak minded, लघुः lowly, कश्चिदिव spiritless, इह now, ए वम् this way, वक्तुम् speaking, न अर्हसि not appropriate
translation: "You who are of truthful valour having made a vow, now speaking in this way, like a lowly person is not appropriate."

meaning: सत्यवादिनः those who speak truth, प्रतिज्ञाम् vows, वितथाम् futile, न कुर्वन्तिहि never make, प्रतिज्ञापरिपालनम् for fulfilment of vow, महत्त्वस्य greatness, लक्षणंहि mark of vow
translation: 'Those who speak truth never fail their vows futile for fulfilment of the vows is a mark of greatness for them'.

meaning: अनघ sinless, मत्कृते on my account, नैराश्यम् to despair, उपगन्तुं च to give up, ते you, नालम्redeem, अद्य now, रावणस्य Ravana's, वधेन destruction, प्रतिज्ञाम् vow, अनुपालय fulfill
translation: "O Sinless Rama! To be in despair on my account is not fair. Destroy Ravana and redeem your vow."

meaning: तव your, बाणपथम् victim of your arrow, गतःnot alive, शत्रुःenemy, नर्धतःroaring, तीक्षणदंष्ट्रस्यpossessing sharp teeth, सिंहस्यlion's, महागजःइव like an elephant, जीवन् live, न यास्यते not possible
translation: " A victim of your arrow can not be alive just as an elephant fallen into the clutch of a roaring lion with sharp teeth is not possible to live."

meaning: एषः, दिवाकरः Sun, कृतकर्मा having completed his day, यावत् before, अस्तम् sets, न यातिbefore departing, अस्य his, दुरात्मनःevil minded, वधम् destruction, शीघ्रम् quickly, अहम् I, इच्छामि wish
translation: "I wish to see the destruction of this evil minded one quickly before the sun completes the day and sets."
